mapper.select: SELECT a.member_date, IFNULL(b.count_num, 0) count_num FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{item} DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) member_date ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(a.member_no) count_num, create_date FROM (SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') create_date FROM member_info) a GROUP BY a.create_date) b ON a.member_date = b.create_date ORDER BY a.member_date
